body:
Yaaay he's moved onto drawing actually fat women!

Noooo he's including insults, cheating and incest garbage along with it!

Speaking for fat people everywhere, love can be cruel, painful and just plain stupid. Being fat makes finding love, and even friendship difficult. But if you accept yourself, sooner or later you'll find someone that accepts you too. You know what else fat people can do? Beat the shit out of the idiots that don't know when to shut up. Luckily for me, the cops were very understanding.
I fucking love the smile at the end... it's time for reckoning baby
This I call pure love
It’s both oniichan and his friend are just using her body, and they are mean to her.
If you are reading this comment your curse is lifted forever and your parents will live.
If you are reading this comment your dick will be shortened by 4 inches within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.

I came for the incest and big girl was cute; but then the bro was a dick to her and that other guy was way better for her. I like this ntr isnt my usual tag but this time its a good one cause girl why let your shitty bro in if hes just gonna put ya down. the other boy likes your body and thats a way happier girl afterward. all thumps up from the story even if the incest part was ruined by the ungrateful brother.
I actually kind of like these types of things. It's like ugly bastard.
bitches be jerkin off to ugly bastard then whine bout shit like dis lmao

There shouldn't be a BBM/BBW tag, better yet, a DFF tag (Disgusting Fat-Fuck). This repugnant shit has to stop! Why do you cucks support this shit?? *puke* Only limp-dicked low-T beta-cucks who are too lazy and stupid to do the basics to just live a normal life and stop being fat, beat it to shit like this. Fatties are unhealthy, disgusting, leeches of society, a burden on the health-care system, sweaty smelly mf'ers who couldn't get laid to save their lives. On the flip side, it's SO easy dating nowadays, when 75% of the 'men' are fat/obese, getting all the hotties is such a breeze. After this Delta/Omicron thing we got going on, we might get an Epsilon.... good, it'll thin the heard just a bit more. Obeasts & obeast-lovers are PATHETIC!
Even the morbidly overweight are not safe from ntr, there is your equality kids ;)
Page 4, 5, & 14 are hot asf the rest is meh
i see bunch of ugly, fat, disgusting people got offended by her brother attitude towards fat people xD Lose weight you fucks
@eman castaneda haha based self hating fat person
I hate fat people
Would've liked to see the shithead brother's face when he finds out that Sanae and Taiichi hooked up behind his back.
ntr? the brother is a kind of a rapist & a toxic motherfucker
Hmm well can't say much
If you like this then you must like ugly bastard as well... it's the rules
How to say.... The incest part seems a little pointless
Im down for her🤚…And imma smack that Oni chan
This is more wholesome because she found out the guy she likes he likes her and likes her for her
Stupid bastard of a brother
